field.name: git_path
field.label: Git command or path
field.description: If git is not available in the $PATH, then update this to the full path to the git application.

field.name: git_branch
field.label: Branch to use
field.description: This will automatically checkout and commit changes to this branch. You need to make sure it is already created though, it will not branch for you.

field.name: git_message
field.label: Message
field.description: The automatic commit message. You can use [date] to replace with a timestamp.
